natural-sunlight.private: Daylight as a primary light source.

candlelight.private: Warm, flickering light with natural movement.

softbox.private: Diffused artificial light for smooth highlights.

spotlight.private: Focused, intense light on a specific subject.

ring-light.private: Even, circular light often used for portraits.

reflective-light.private: Light bounced off surfaces to soften intensity.

streetlight-sodium.private: Warm, orange-yellow light creating a moody, vintage feel.

streetlight-halide.private: Bright white-bluish light, offering crisp visibility and modern aestetic.

gfb.private: Softbox lighting for a consistent, soft light that mimics natural sunlight and enhances skin tones and texture.
